textos_fuente.text: About â€” Event Staff, Inc. Home About Services Clients Jobs Contact Home About Services Clients Jobs Contact About Serving Since 1990 we elevate the experience Event Staff, Inc. is a leader in providing comprehensive and professional, event staffing solutions. We specialize in concerts, sports, conventions, trade shows and corporate events. We guarantee success in both small and large-scale experiences. Our uncanny ability to go into a city and create a workforce from scratch is unparalleled. We have success in the following cities: Atlanta, Georgia Baltimore, Maryland Charlotte, North Carolina Detroit, Michigan Dover, Delaware Durham, North Carolina Kansas City, Kansas Los Angeles, California Philadelphia, Pennsylvania Washington, DC OUR PROCESS Client debriefs event staff on details of the event. Event Staff customizes the core team to complement the clientâ€™s vision. Event Staff runs a background check. Event Staff host a walk through at the designated venue 30 to 60 days before the event ensure consistency of work flow. Implement a risk management tool to ensure flawless execution. Event Staff host a meeting with the â€œUnique Staffâ€ and disseminates the information and logistics to the group. Event Staff provides transporatation when necessary. The staff is given a prepaid card for their services. OUR BENEFITS Event Staff, Inc. provides greater efficiencies and economies of scale. We work in a collaborative environment with the corporate event executives. Recruiting Advertising Interviewing Screening Reference Checks Orientation Training Payroll Processing Scheduling Office Expenses Call-Outs & No-Shows Top

About Us â€“ Ranch Organics Login / Join / 0 / $ 0.00 Facebook Instagram bath & body moisturize cleanse soak by the gallon (refills) full product selection collections cedar wood sweet grass lavender orange and vanilla rose geranium ranch free winter woods harvest ranch kitchen soap goat milk soap botanical soap gifts all gifts About Us It all started in a barn... The ranch is nestled in the Elk River Valley near Steamboat Springs, Colorado. Years ago, word got out about our penchant for brewing up small batches of rustic yet refined bath products. We still live the real-deal ranching life on this little slice of Rocky Mountain paradise. Our beautiful acres of mountain meadows, aspen trees, and surrounded by towering peaks of the Mount Zirkel Wilderness. This is just part of the wholesome Rocky Mountain romance that infuses all of our hand crafted bath products. We call it Ranch to Tubâ„¢. Ranch Organics creates mineral-rich bath and beauty products honed from natureâ€™s apothecary, right here on the ranch. Out here, we revel in wildflower-filled summers, followed by winters steeped in light, fluffy snow.Â  Each of the botanical essences in our signature ranch blends evokes a dramatic changing season. Our bath and body products are infused with everything clean and crisp we love about the Rockies. Inhale summerâ€™s earthy hay bales, winterâ€™s delicate snow crystals, fallâ€™s luscious lavender and springâ€™s sweet new grass. Let them evoke the big vistas, the million-star skies and the aimless wanderings of local wildlife. Ranch Organics bath and body products connect your senses with the soul of the earth â€“ fresh, luxurious soaps and lotions that wear on your skin as comfortably as your favorite denim. About â€“ Ocean Ranch Organics Skip to content HOME ABOUT Shop Organic Granola Granola Bars Subscription Boxes From the Farm SUSTAINABILITY COMMUNITY Ocean Ranch BLOG Contact Wholesale Inquiries Login Cart   / $ 0.00 0 No products in the cart. 0 Cart No products in the cart. If you truly love nature, you will find beauty everywhere. â€“ Vincent van Gogh OUR STORY Ocean Ranch is a woman-owned business that is fostered on the belief that food should be filled with bold flavored, nutrient dense, and organically grown ingredients. We infuse our products with flavors inspired by both our own organic farm and global culinary cuisine. Our granola and snacks are made from scratch and handcrafted in our kitchens. This means we pay close attention to all of our hand selected ingredients and imbue our products with a personal touch. OUR MISSION To create imaginative, healthy, culinary alternatives to traditional foods. To support regenerative and organic agriculture. To inspire people to live healthier lives. To remember that our purchasing habits make an impact on the world. We live this mission by: Nurturing creativity thru inspiration, innovation, and initiation Choosing ingredients that are organic and sustainably grown Creating products that are energizing and nutritious Making a positive impact through philanthropic endeavors Taking care of our team and ourselves by working hard, playing hard, and laughing often Embracing balance, dedication, and focus MEET THE TEAM Kim Redman Founder/CEO Jenn Smith Sales & Marketing Rae Gulland Operations Stanton Smith Brand Manager Cory Arrambide Social Media Guru Bryan Torgerson Creative Director Contact Us To inquire about orders or if you have any questions about our products, please fill out our Contact form. Our Offices Address 1072 Casitas Pass Rd, #199, Carpinteria, CA 93013 Phone 805-455-9852 Email info@oceanranchorganics.com WHO WE ARE Ocean Ranch Organics is a woman-owned, organic food company based in Carpinteria. We believe in traditional methods of creating delicious food as well as only using all natural, whole ingredients. All of our products are handcrafted in small batches the old-fashioned way to lock in freshness and flavor. More about us -> GET IN TOUCH E-mail Us Follow us on Instagram Like us on Facebook Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. E-mail Address Share your email with us and we will send you updates on new products and alert you when we are running sales! We will never share or sell your information. Staff Calculator Questions and Answers What type of events does Premier staff  cater to? We provide a variety of event staff services, catering to corporate functions, product launches, promotional events, private parties, weddings, festivals, and more. Whether itâ€™s a grand corporate gala or an intimate celebration, our skilled staff are equipped to handle events of any size and style. What kind of staff can I hire through Premier Staff? We provide a variety of event staff services, catering to corporate functions, product launches, promotional events, private parties, weddings, festivals, and more. Whether itâ€™s a grand corporate gala or an intimate celebration, our skilled staff are equipped to handle events of any size and style. How does the booking process work? Booking event staff services with Premier Staff is straightforward and . Simply contact us with your event detailsâ€”date, location, staffing needs, and any specific requirements. Weâ€™ll provide a customized quote and work with you to select the perfect team for your event. Is Premier Staff available in my city? Starting as the best event staffing agency in Los Angeles, weâ€™ve expanded our services nationwide to all major cities across the United States.Â Explore our locations page to find a Premier Staff team near you. Can I request specific staff members or types of staff? Absolutely! We strive to tailor our event staff services to your preferences. Let us know if you have specific requests or requirements, and weâ€™ll work to match you with staff members who best fit your eventâ€™s theme and needs. How do you handle last-minute changes or emergencies? Our team is adept at adapting to last-minute changes. We have contingency plans in place and a roster of professional event staff in LA (and nationwide!) ready to step in as needed. Communication is key, and we work closely with you to address any unforeseen circumstances promptly. Todayâ€™s   bridal   parties   walk   the   aisle   in   a   wide   variety   of   colors.   But   it   wasnâ€™t   always   that   way. When   Englandâ€™s   Queen   Victoria   was   preparing   to   marry   Prince   Albert   in   1840,   she   is   said   to   have   helped   to   design   her   bridesmaidsâ€™   white   dresses   and   her   own   white   gown.   That   helped ... popularize   white   for   brides   and   wedding   parties. Soon,   bridesmaidsâ€™   dresses   were   being   designed   to   look   like   less-extravagant   versions   of   the   brideâ€™s   gown.   Bridesmaids   even   wore   veils,   just   shorter   than   the   brideâ€™s. Then   fabric   dyes   in   vibrant   colors   became   affordable   for   the   non-wealthy.   Thatâ€™s   when   brides   started   experimenting   with   new   hues   for   the   wedding   party. By   the   1940s,   a   new   tradition   was   firmly   in   place:   white   was   reserved   for   the   bride   alone. Now   in   American   culture,   itâ€™s   seen   as   a   gaffe   for   anyone   else   at   a   wedding   to   wear   white.   Our   eyes   are   naturally   drawn   to   white.   And   wearing   white   can   be   seen   as   an   attempt   to   call   attention   away   from   the   center   of   Wedding   Day   attentionâ€”the   lovely   bride. #weddingtrends   #floridaweddings   #elegantwedding   #cbarranchweddings   #bridetribeğŸ’   #bridalpartygoals   #weddinghistory 13 2 Share 18066763145266518 Follow C Bar Ranch and Organics 3 weeks ago Lightbox link for post with description âœ¨NEWSFLASH   âœ¨
